HediffDef.label: fogger
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of influencing the humidity levels of the surrounding atmosphere, causing a deep, thick fog to coalesce around.

HediffDef.label: rainmaker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering the atmospheric pressure around, causing constant precipitation.

HediffDef.label: foggy rainmaker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering the atmospheric pressure around, causing constant precipitation and a deep, thick fog to coalesce.

HediffDef.label: rainy thunderstorm maker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of drastically increasing electrostatic energy and lowering atmospheric pressure, causing a violent rainy thunderstorm to form.

HediffDef.label: dry thunderstorm maker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of drastically increasing electrostatic energy in the atmosphere, causing a violent dry thunderstorm to form. This does not make the carrier immune to lightning strikes!

HediffDef.label: snow maker
HediffDef.description: A distributed cloud of mechanites is interwoven with the DNA of this person. These mechanites have the ability of drastically lowering temperature in the upper atmosphere, causing snow to fall.
